meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>original</kanji> thing you <kanji>make</kanji> is the <vocabulary>original work</vocabulary>. It's always better to have the original, rather than a copy, I think.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
